TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XDocumentType extends System.Xml.Linq.XNode

summary.span: Representa una definición de tipo del documento (DTD) XML.

span.span: Represents an XML Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las definiciones de tipo de datos (DTD) XML son una manera de hacer lo siguiente:Data Type Definitions (DTD) in XML are a way to do the following: - Validar árboles XML de forma limitada.Validate XML trees to a limited extent. - Expandir las entidades, que es una forma de texto de reemplazo.Expand entities, which is a form of text replacement. - Proporcionar los atributos predeterminados.Supply default attributes. Esta clase representa el concepto XML de una DTD.This class represents the XML concept of a DTD. Compatibilidad con DTD en [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] está limitado.DTD support in [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] is limited. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] se expandirá a entidades internas de forma predeterminada, pero no se resolverán hace referencia a entidad externa a menos que un con un asociado se usa para cargar el árbol XML.will expand internal entities by default, but it will not resolve external entity references unless an with an associated is used to load the XML tree. [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] no se validará un documento con una DTD, pero puede usar una validación para realizar la validación de DTD si es necesario.will not validate a document against a DTD, but you can use a validating to perform DTD validation if necessary. Para validar un [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] árbol con un esquema XML, utilice el método.To validate an [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] tree against an XML schema, use the method. Cuando un documento contiene las referencias de entidad que se definen en una DTD, se expanden las referencias al crear el árbol XML.When a document contains entity references that are defined in a DTD, the references are expanded upon creation of the XML tree. Sin embargo, al serializar o guardar el árbol XML, se conserva el contenido de las entidades expandidas; las referencias de entidad no lo son.However, when you serialize or save the XML tree, the content of the expanded entities is preserved; the entity references are not. Atributos predeterminados de la DTD se materializarán como atributos regulares en el árbol XML.Default attributes from the DTD will be materialized as regular attributes in the XML tree. Una vez se materializa un atributo predeterminado de la DTD, no hay ninguna manera de determinar que el atributo era un atributo predeterminado de la DTD.After a default attribute from the DTD is materialized, there is no way to determine that the attribute was a default attribute from the DTD. Puede rellenar un árbol XML con un documento XML que contiene una DTD interna.You can populate an XML tree with an XML document that contains an internal DTD. El árbol XML, a continuación, contendrá un nodo.The XML tree will then contain a node. Al serializar o guardar el árbol, la DTD interna también se guardará como parte del documento.When you serialize or save the tree, the internal DTD will also be saved as part of the document.

Public Sub New (name As String, publicId As String, systemId As String, internalSubset As String)

new System.Xml.Linq.XDocumentType : string * string * string * string -> System.Xml.Linq.XDocumentType

param.name: name
param.span: que contiene el nombre completo de la DTD, que es igual que el nombre completo del elemento raíz del documento XML.

span.span: A that contains the qualified name of the DTD, which is the same as the qualified name of the root element of the XML document.

param.name: publicId
param.span: que contiene el identificador público de una DTD pública externa.

span.span: A that contains the public identifier of an external public DTD.

param.name: systemId
param.span: que contiene el identificador de sistema de una DTD privada externa.

span.span: A that contains the system identifier of an external private DTD.

param.name: internalSubset
param.span: que contiene el subconjunto interno de una DTD interna.

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for an internal DTD.

summary.span: Inicializa una instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente crea un documento con una DTD interna.The following example creates a document with an internal DTD. Cuando crea el objeto, especifica el nombre completo de la DTD (Pubs) y una cadena que contiene el subconjunto interno.When it creates the object, it specifies the qualified name of the DTD (Pubs), and a string that contains the internal subset. Dado que el documento no usa una DTD externa pública o privada, el `publicId` y `systemId` se establecen en `null`.Because the document does not use a public or private external DTD, the `publicId` and `systemId` are set to `null`. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.NextNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ```xml ]> Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar ```

summary.span: Obtiene o establece el subconjunto interno de esta definición de tipo de documento (DTD).

span.span: Gets or sets the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: que contiene el subconjunto interno de esta definición de tipo de documento (DTD).

span.span: A that contains the internal subset for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente crea un documento con una DTD que contiene un subconjunto interno.The following example creates a document with a DTD that contains an internal subset. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.InternalSubset) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ``` ```

summary.span: Obtiene o establece el nombre de esta definición de tipo de documento (DTD).

span.span: Gets or sets the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: que contiene el nombre de esta definición de tipo de documento (DTD).

span.span: A that contains the name for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente crea un documento XML que contiene una DTD.The following example creates an XML document that contains a DTD. Después de crear el documento, recupera el nombre completo de la DTD mediante esta propiedad.After creating the document, it retrieves the qualified name of the DTD using this property. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.Name) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ``` Pubs ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property NodeType As XmlNodeType
public: virtual property System::Xml::XmlNodeType NodeType { System::Xml::XmlNodeType get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el tipo de nodo de este nodo.

span.span: Gets the node type for this node.
The node type.

value.span: Para los objetos , este valor es .

span.span: For objects, this value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Dado que todas las clases que derivan de contienen un propiedad, puede escribir código que opere en las colecciones de subclases concretas de .Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . A continuación, puede probar el código para el tipo de nodo de cada nodo de la colección.Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra el uso de esta propiedad para recuperar el tipo de nodo para un objeto.The following example shows the use of this property to retrieve the node type for an object. ```csharp string internalSubset = @" "; string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XComment("This is a comment."), new XProcessingInstruction(target, data), new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, null, internalSubset), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType); ``` ```vb Dim internalSubset = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc.FirstNode.AddAfterSelf(new XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, Nothing, internalSubset)) Console.WriteLine(doc.DocumentType.NodeType.ToString()) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ``` DocumentType ```

span.span: A that contains the public identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si un documento XML usa una DTD pública externa, esta propiedad contendrá el identificador público de la DTD externa.If an XML document uses an external public DTD, this property will contain the public identifier of the external DTD.

summary.span: Obtiene o establece el identificador de sistema de esta definición de tipo de documento (DTD).

span.span: Gets or sets the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

value.span: que contiene el identificador de sistema de esta definición de tipo de documento (DTD).

span.span: A that contains the system identifier for this Document Type Definition (DTD).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si un documento XML usa una DTD privada externa, esta propiedad contendrá el identificador privado de la DTD externa.If an XML document uses an external private DTD, this property will contain the private identifier of the external DTD. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente crea un documento XML que hace referencia a una DTD privada externa.The following example creates an XML document that refers to an external private DTD. La DTD no tiene un subconjunto interno.The DTD does not have an internal subset. La llamada a la constructor refleja el uso de la DTD privada externa.The call to the constructor reflects the use of the external private DTD. Pasa `null` para el subconjunto interno.It passes `null` for the internal subset. ```csharp string pubsDtd = @" "; File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd); string target = "xml-stylesheet"; string data = "href=\"mystyle.css\" title=\"Compact\" type=\"text/css\""; XDocument doc = new XDocument( new XDocumentType("Pubs", null, "Pubs.dtd", null), new XElement("Pubs", new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Artifacts of Roman Civilization"), new XElement("Author", "Moreno, Jordao") ), new XElement("Book", new XElement("Title", "Midieval Tools and Implements"), new XElement("Author", "Gazit, Inbar") ) ), new XComment("This is another comment.") ); doc.Declaration = new XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true"); doc.Save("Pubs.xml"); // Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. XmlReaderSettings xrs = new XmlReaderSettings(); xrs.ProhibitDtd = false; xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD; xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto; XmlReader xr = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs); XDocument doc2 = XDocument.Load(xr); XDocumentType dt = doc2.Document.DocumentType; Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId); ``` ```vb Dim pubsDtd As String = _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" & Environment.NewLine & _ "" File.WriteAllText("Pubs.dtd", pubsDtd) Dim target As String = "xml-stylesheet" Dim data As String = "href='mystyle.css' title='Compact' type='text/css'" Dim doc As XDocument = _ Artifacts of Roman Civilization Moreno, Jordao Midieval Tools and Implements Gazit, Inbar doc _ .FirstNode _ .AddBeforeSelf(New XDocumentType("Pubs", Nothing, "Pubs.dtd", Nothing)) doc.Declaration = New XDeclaration("1.0", "utf-8", "true") doc.Save("Pubs.xml") ' Validate Pubs.xml against Pubs.dtd. Dim xrs As XmlReaderSettings = New XmlReaderSettings() xrs.ProhibitDtd = False xrs.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD xrs.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Auto Dim xr As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create("Pubs.xml", xrs) Dim doc2 As XDocument = XDocument.Load(xr) Dim dt As XDocumentType = doc2.Document.DocumentType Console.WriteLine("SystemId:{0}", dt.SystemId) ``` Este ejemplo produce el siguiente resultado:This example produces the following output: ``` SystemId:Pubs.dtd ```
